Eclipse 2 (current version) runs, but version 3 does not. I have been using 
JBuilder 8 succesfully on this machine for almost 2 years. Logs at end.

Sorry for long text. Hope it helps.

Two other developers at this company are successfully running M8 build. We've 
compared java SDK installations (I'm currently using 1.4.2_04. Have also tried 
_01 first). One other developer has the 1.4.2._01, and one has 1.4.2_04. I've 
also compared the "jre\lib\ext" directories on our two machines. Identical. 
I've commented out java.exe and javaw.exe from Windows directory. Used 
a "whereis" utility to check path for any other occurrences, etc.

I've tried a number of command line options to try and get more information. 
Difficult to find what they all are!  (I used JBuilder to examine .class files 
in startup, and tried all of the potential startup parameters. Log below is 
result of this. 

I've also tried at home with same result (doesn't run). Also XP Pro, with 1 gb 
memory Athalon 2100. .NET 1.1 installed. Visual Studio.NET installed (at home 
only).

XP Pro with 512mb, Pentium 4, 11 gb free on drive. Ms .NET 1.1 installed (only 
thing I can think of that's "unusual".
